name: Chicken Going Rampant
description:
Chickens' base was attacked and the rats ate all the eggs! It's time for chickens to revenge!

A little cute casual tower defense game for your free time.

Control: 

Mouse is all you need. Save up energy, build your armies and destroy rats' bases. Use magic eggs to power up your armies, and combine eggs for more variations in strategies.

Team member:

FriedCroco - coding & spriting

Credits:

daScript/dasbox by Gaijin Entertainment

FreePixel font by levelb

Sound effects at mixkit.co

Background music (shimmer, reNovation, spacedust, disOrder) by airtone
